Room.Name: Prince Ragnar's Waiting Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the waiting room for those who would pledge or rescind their pledge to Prince Ragnar.
Room.LongDescription: In the center of the room is a small table with a single parchment on it. The parchment is a covenant between you and Ragnar if you choose to honor it. A priest and a palidin stand nearby, ready to witness your oath of fealty to the realm. To pledge, you must step to the south, where you will be given a last chance to decide this important step in your life.
